entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 4.9°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of thunderstorms. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1.
